author: David Webster
comment: Very well designed simple watch faces at great value. Totally refreshing compared to the rest and what I've been waiting for.                   One request: Any chance in transitioning colours, alternating throughout day/ breathing effects?

reply.author: TIMESAPP
reply.content: Hi, thank you. This is a nice idea - of course it needs a lot of work. Now I have no resources for such an option. Maybe in a future. Thanks.

title: Brilliant.

author: Brian Martin
comment: The watch faces are nice, but there seems to be no way to change the colours on watch or phone. Also 9TTMM just shows a black face when screen is dimmed.

reply.author: TIMESAPP
reply.content: Hi, I will check 9TTMM issue. To change colors simply tap selected model icon on Android Wear App - color customization should be open. In case of problems write to me directly

title: Needs some improvements

author: David Traumann
comment: Gorgeous watch faces and they really stand out. 4 watch faces for 35 cents each is a steal anyway. Very pleased. Keep up the great art-work.
title: Different from the rest

author: Alexander Williams
comment: Watch faces look great, but I am unable to modify any of the settings in any of the watch faces :(

reply.author: TIMESAPP
reply.content: Tap twice specific watchface icon on Wear App - it should open watchface color settings
